def avg_array(arrs):
    return [sum(a)/len(a) for a in zip(*arrs)]

def avg_array(arrs):
    return [(sum(ar[i] for ar in arrs))/len(arrs) for i in range(len(arrs[0]))]

def avg_array(arrs):

    return [sum(a)/len(a) for a in list(zip(*arrs))]

def avg_array(arrs):
    return  [sum(i)/len(i) for i in zip(*arrs)]
